name: d3-array
description: Array manipulation, ordering, searching, summarizing, etc.

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-array/build/d3-array.js d3-array.v1.js && cp ../d3-array/build/d3-array.min.js d3-array.v1.min.js && git add d3-array.v1.js d3-array.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-array ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-array.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-array.js build/d3-array.min.js
